TEXT: A prodigy from the rough streets of Zaun, Ekko manipulates time to twist any situation to his advantage.
NL You make the Heart rewind time.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~genius~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
